Title: Relates to benefits for police officers, correction officers, firefighters, and other emergency personnel diagnosed with PTSD
Summary: Relates to benefits for police officers, correction officers, firefighters, and other emergency personnel diagnosed with PTSD by making their injury compensable if it cannot be shown, by a preponderance of evidence, that the PTSD was caused by factors unrelated to their occupation.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to benefits for police officers, correction officers, firefighters, and other emergency personnel diagnosed with PTSD
